org.hibernate.persister.entity
Interface PropertyMapping

All Known Subinterfaces:
Queryable, QueryableCollection, SQLLoadableCollection
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractCollectionPersister, AbstractEntityPersister, AbstractPropertyMapping, CollectionPropertyMapping, ElementPropertyMapping
public interface PropertyMapping

Abstraction of all mappings that define properties: entities, collection elements.

Author:
Gavin King

Method Summary

          Get the type of the thing containing the properties

          Given a query alias and a property path, return the qualified column name

          Given a component path expression, get the type of the property
